title: Apple could be working on a 15-inch MacBook Air for next year
content:
Apple has been slowly transitioning from Intel processors to its own silicon on the Mac lineup. At this point, most Mac models on sale include one of the M1 chips — M1, M1 Pro, M1 Max, or the all-new M1 Ultra. And as the Cupertino tech giant implements these internal changes, it also has been

The post Apple could be working on a 15-inch MacBook Air for next year appeared first on xda-developers.
description: According to a report, Apple could be working on a 15-inch MacBook Air. This new Mac's potenital release could be during 2023.
